term: End suction close coupled inline water pump
original_definition: 'End suction close coupled inline water pump' means a water pump of which the water inlet of the pump is on the same axis as the water outlet of the pump;
generated_definition: 'End suction close coupled inline water pump' means a type of water pump that is designed to pump water from a source to a point of use, typically through a pipe or hose, and is characterized by its end suction design and close coupling to the pump impeller.

Article 2: ‘End suction close coupled inline water pump’ (ESCCi) means a water pump of which the water inlet of the pump is on the same axis as the water outlet of the pump;
